src:
VIDEO: Kaj bi se vam zgodilo, če bi vsak dan v mesecu naredili 100 trebušnjakov
Rezultat je lepo viden.
05 Nov 2019, 09:39 by A. L.
Nekateri trdijo, da trebušnjaki ne prispevajo veliko k poudarku trebušnih mišic, ampak da je bistvena prehrana. Kaj pa če imaš prehrano urejeno? To se je odločil preveriti bodibilder Matt, ki ima na youtubu preko milijon sledilcev. Ves mesec je vsak dan delal pa 100 trebušnjakov in rezultat je viden. Priznava, da mu 100 trebušnjakov v kosu ni uspelo narediti, je pa do številke 100 vendarle skušal priti s čim manj premori, da so mišice imele 24 ur za regeneracijo. Prvi dan jih je naredil 44, po približno treh tednih pa je število ponovitev v prvi seriji povečal na 68. Ne glede na rezultat Matt meni, da je samo s to vajo dolgoročno nemogoče vzdrževati takšen rezultat, saj je napredek najvidnejši prav v prvih tednih in mesecih, nato pa se telo privadi na ta stres. Ko se to zgodi, preidite na drugo vajo, svetuje.
text:
VIDEO: What would happen to you if you made 100 bellies every day of the month
The result is clearly visible.
05 Nov 2019, 09:39 by A.L.
Some argue that bellies do not contribute much to the stress of the abdominal muscles, but that it is an essential diet. But what if you have a healthy diet? This is decided to check out bodybuilder Matt, who has over a million followers on YouTube. Throughout the month, he worked 100 bellies every day and the result is visible. He admits he failed to make 100 bellies in the piece, but still tried to get to the 100 number with as little pause as possible, so that the muscles had 24 hours to regenerate. On the first day, he made 44, and after about three weeks, increased the number of reps in the first series to 68. Regardless of the result, Matt believes that this exercise alone is impossible to maintain in the long run, since progress is most visible in the first weeks and for months, and then the body becomes accustomed to this stress. When this happens, move on to another exercise, she advises.
